label: SustainabilityInspection
comment: The process of performing documented checks of sustainability characteristics, with a focus on discovering deviations, related to documented sustainability requirements.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
The indication of whether or not this specified inspection is outsourced.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A specified inspection result applicable to this sustainability characteristic.
A referenced standard applicable to this agricultural certificate.
A characteristic applicable to this sustainability inspection.
A binary file attached for this sustainability inspection.
The party executing this specified inspection.
The inspector executing this specified inspection.
A referenced document for this specified inspection.
A specified inspection event for this sustainability inspection.
The inspection status specified for this sustainability inspection.
